short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Access and Search your friends recommendations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Listlicious is a platform that lets you have access and find out your friend's recommendations or discoveries.

Use our chrome extension to save web contents easily and add them to the list of your choice!
Public list for your friends to share or Private list for your own use.

Make the most of it!
